results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-675d59c755-gncdk], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-675d59c755-gncdk' is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-675d59c755-gncdk`. 3. Verify readiness probe settings. 4. Ensure pod dependencies are running. 5. Restart pod if needed.

results.name: default/wordpress-675d59c755-gncdk

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
